data.name: Financial Inclusion and How FinTech Supports Society at All Times
data.summary: FinTech has from its inception been paramount in financial inclusion, addressing the gaps left when it comes to access to financial services. The latest Coronavirus crisis illustrates perfectly how FinTech stepped into the breach once again to protect the most vulnerable in society.
data.speakers:
Bindi Karia, Innovation Expert & Advisor
Delber Lage, CEO, SalaryFits
Philip Briffett, Head of Partnerships, Wagestream
Greg Davies, Head of Behavioural Finance,Oxford Risk
Louise Hill, Co-Founder & COO,GoHenry
Joanne Dewar, CEO, Global Processing Services
